channel.title: Jagex
channel.description: Some people have talked of servers getting closed by jagex, I know the probability for my server is about .01% but I still want to prevent this.. I heard it was to send a link of runescape itself, am I right? ;D

[/quote]

coz his is a 525 cache. And he stole a fuck load of players.[/quote]Isnt Battlescape 317?

item.title: Jagex
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

They will only try to shut down servers that 1. make a good amount of profit, 2. have a client or web client that is hosted right there on the site, 3. makes money, 4. makes money, 5. makes money, 6. did I say money yet?

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:11, topic:314705”]I wouldn’t worry about it to be honest.

They would only really try and shut you down if you were actually making profit from it, for example, selling the items on the server for real money.

But yeah, this topic doesn’t belong in this section.
Moved.[/quote]

Reading threw all the posts, this is what I was going to say. If you don’t ask for donations or sell membership/items/staff spots Jagex wont give a fuck about your server. Unless it gets too big like Frugoo. That got acouple thousand people within days and was shutdown instantly by Jagex most likely for stealing players(Don’t flame me, I don’t know the whole back story, feel free to correct me) but SilentCJ summed it up pretty good.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

As it has been said numerous times… The client is the only illegal part since its using their cache. Jagex only goes after the servers making profit as said by SilentCJ… Such as Dodian was for membership, and other servers getting cash for items, etc… Donations do not matter since its in the free will of the person to send the money. If you decide to sell items and start making loads from it… Jagex will most likely try to shut u down. If you want to be real safe, ban every ip from the U.K lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I wouldn’t worry about it to be honest.

They would only really try and shut you down if you were actually making profit from it, for example, selling the items on the server for real money.

But yeah, this topic doesn’t belong in this section.
Moved.

item.title: Jagex
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“clarkyrulz, post:9, topic:314705”][quote author=Brennan The Great link=topic=411164.msg3033074#msg3033074 date=1258516784]
Okay, your server is NOT going to get shut down by Jagex the entire time you’re running it. The server is being run off YOUR computer, they can’t do anything to it unless they get onto your computer and turn it off themself, which they wont do. They don’t even bother with them, as Alec said above, anyway. You’re 100% safe from Jagex doing anything.

BUT - Correct me if I’m wrong, as I’m not perfect. I may be incorrect, but I’m near positive on this.
[/quote]

Well… Jagex dont need to get on your computer they send you a DMCA then if you don’t do what they tell you to do they limit your Vps and contact there layers.[/quote]

lol? battlescape actually replyed to them about what would happen and why people play p servers, its on rune s erver…

Read full topic

BUT - Correct me if I’m wrong, as I’m not perfect. I may be incorrect, but I’m near positive on this.[/quote]

Well… Jagex dont need to get on your computer they send you a DMCA then if you don’t do what they tell you to do they limit your Vps and contact there layers.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex
item.dc:creator: @Brennan_The_Great Brennan The Great
item.description:
@Brennan_The_Great wrote:

Okay, your server is NOT going to get shut down by Jagex the entire time you’re running it. The server is being run off YOUR computer, they can’t do anything to it unless they get onto your computer and turn it off themself, which they wont do. They don’t even bother with them, as Alec said above, anyway. You’re 100% safe from Jagex doing anything.

BUT - Correct me if I’m wrong, as I’m not perfect. I may be incorrect, but I’m near positive on this.

Read full topic
